effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Power increases inversely with happiness, given by `(255 - happiness) * 2 / 5`, to a maximum of 102. Power bottoms out at 1.

short_effect.x_y: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

flavor_text.x_y: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.
